name: Brazil
startIntroPart1: All Hail his most respected and magnanimous Emperor, Pedro II of Brazil. It was with great insight and unshakeable dignity that you ruled the Brazilian empire for over 50 years, ushering in a time of lasting peace and prosperity. Your reputation as a stern, but fair leader was never blemished by controversy, as your unwavering dedication to the people of Brazil provided hope and established the kingdom's position in South America. Your scholarly pursuits and staunch defense of freedom of speech led to the creation of several institutions of higher learning, strengthening Brazil's sense of national identity.
startIntroPart2: Revered Emperor Pedro, your people long for a return to the peaceful days. when you walked among them, hearing their stories and reassuring them of a bright future. Will you once again lead your kingdom to prosperity? Can you build a civilization that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Brazil.
introduction: Hello, I am Pedro II of Brazil. It seems that brilliant minds are destined to meet.

name: Kongo
startIntroPart1: Glory to the Kongo King! Lord Mvemba a Nzinga, or as he became known, Alfonso I. His reign over the Kongo was majestic and sacred. After the war against his brother, the Kongo was converted to Catholicism and expanded its kingdom more than ever before, taking over a large part of West Africa and spreading its immense culture and religion. After his death, the Kongo faced unimaginable challenges to survive and was dismantled and annexed by those who claimed to be our allies.
startIntroPart2: Great Alfonso I! Are you able to make our kingdom as powerful as it once was? Can you make it shine in history and throughout the ages?

defeated: My people never will accept you crown!

name: Romania

During his reign, Wallachia consolidated its sovereignty and spiritual honor. Years after the wars, the Romanian nation was founded by the legendary King Carol I. Even in exile, you ignored the unjust demands of those infiltrators and put Wallachia first! Romanians have never stopped dreaming of a leader as sovereign as his highness.
startIntroPart2: Your Highness! Is your relentless strength capable of bringing glorious days to Romania? Will you be able to make our kingdom as sovereign as it once was?
declaringWar: I will not obey your idiotic demands! Let's see who has the power here, this is war!
attacked: You dont have sense of you're are doing!
defeated: Kill me now, I will not kneel before you...

name: Mali
startIntroPart1: Great Musa! After triumphs in wars of expansion, the Mali Empire rose in West Africa, expanding Mandinka culture and consolidating the Islamic faith. You were also recognized for your wealth, strength, wisdom, and mercy. You made a great pilgrimage to the holy city, bringing with you high culture and wealth, as well as skilled engineers and mathematicians. The Empire declined after rival empires arose and internal conflicts intensified.
startIntroPart2: Oh Great Mansa! May our golden age never end! May our Empire shine through time and history.
declaringWar: You dont have spiritual abundance! i will show how to make a true nation for you people!
attacked: This have a price! and you will pay!
defeated: Ok, you win. Stay with my richness, i dont care.

name: Zulu
startIntroPart1: Your people kneel before you, great warrior Shaka of the Zulu Kingdom. As you rose from a place of exile to become the true leader of the Zulus, you ushered in changes throughout the Zulu society, implementing new laws and cultural reforms that strengthened the position of your kingdom. However, it was your tenacity in the art of war that truly established your reputation, as your tactics and strategies on the battlefield forever changed the face of combat across the plains of southern Africa.
startIntroPart2: Most formidable king, your people once again long for the unity and strength your leadership afforded them. Can you return the Zulu kingdom to such great prominence? Will you build a civilization that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: None will slow our progress, not even you! Prepare for war!
attacked: Your arrogance will only lead you to defeat!
defeated: My warriors have failed, and so I failed them.
introduction: I'm Shaka of Zulu. Don't try to move, warrior, or I'll destroy you.
hateHello: You say? What are you doing here?

name: Jerusalem

After victories and resistance against the Caliphate's troops, your reign over Jerusalem was marked by years of relative peace and tolerance. After our fall by the Great Saladin, years passed and wars upon wars ravaged the sacred soil of the Holy Land.
startIntroPart2: Great King Baldwin! Would it be possible to recreate such a sacred kingdom again? Could we make it shine through time and history?

attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

But even so, you are still remembered for your bravery and resistance.
